body_html: Hey @agnik5, 👍 to everything you said 😄 . The numbered items fall all nicely into place as a priority list. I think no. 1 should really be fixed. The save! call raises an exception if the record is invalid. This would have to be changed to a normal save (w/o the bang). The form has to be re-rendered when there was an error and redirected in case everything went well.

body: Hey @agnik5, 👍 to everything you said 😄 . The numbered items fall all nicely into place as a priority list. I think no. 1 should _really_ be fixed. The `save!`  call raises an exception if the record is invalid. This would have to be changed to a normal `save` (w/o the bang). The form has to be re-rendered when there was an error and redirected in case everything went well.
